title: all these nurfs
body: sick of you kicking champs that we like in the teeth keep it up and i will quit league and go play heroes of the storm i know you cant make everyone happy but the thing thats REALLY got me ticked off riot is you nearly killed {{champion:37}} and then gave her and ulti skin......SHE'S NO WHERE NEAR {{champion:81}}  ANYMORE WHY GIVE HER THAT SKIN?! much hate much disappointment you have failed your players

replies.body: sona is in a good spot atm tbh

I am happy with sona now. I am happy because she does not build a troll build and steal everyones kills with a face roll when they get down to 400 health.

although with a lot of *other* champions I feel as if they need to be buffed up more, because they are slipping so far behind that as much as players love their personalities and play styles they just *can't* be played effectively.
do you even know what sona was?! ........ would have far better to have legendary skin when she was broken she is but a shadow of her former self
